import React from 'react' import {Formik, Form, Field} from 'formik' import { contactAPI } from '../../api' import s from './Contact.module.css' const initialValues = { name: '', companyName: '', emailAddress: '', phoneNumber: '', subject: '', message: '', } type PropsType = { userID: string | null } export const Contact = (props: PropsType) => { const onSubmit = (body: { name: string, companyName: string, emailAddress: string, phoneNumber: string, subject: string, message: string }) => { const owner = { owner : Number(props.userID) } const Target = Object.assign(body, owner) contactAPI.PutContact(Target) } const FormikElement = (props: { label: string, name: string, placeholder: string }) => (
) return
}
